abstract.t: This memo describes a TCP [RFC0793] extension to enhance security for BGP [I-D.ietf-idr-bgp4] and other TCP-based protocols requiring message authentication. It provides message authentication using a Message Authentication Code (MAC), which is a superior authentication method to the keyed MD5 method previously used. The option also includes provision for automatic generation and distribution of MAC keys. A set of MAC algorithms are specified, as well as guidance when to use each one.
